name: variant?: '' | 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'tertiary' | 'info' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'danger' | string
description: Defines the color variant for the slider.

name: colors?: '' | 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'tertiary' | 'info' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'danger' | string
description: Defines custom colors for the slider.

name: class?: string
description: CSS class for the slider component.

name: radius?: 'rounded-full' | 'rounded-md' | 'rounded-lg' | 'rounded-xl' | 'rounded-2xl' | 'rounded-3xl' | 'rounded-4xl' | 'rounded-5xl' | 'rounded-6xl' | 'rounded-7xl' | 'rounded-none'
description: Specifies the border radius for the slider.

name: classBar?: string
description: CSS class for the slider's bar.

name: format?: 'thick' | 'thin' | 'normal'
description: Defines the thickness format of the slider.

name: classStep?: string
description: CSS class for the slider steps.

name: classButton?: string
description: CSS class for the slider button.

name: steps?: number
description: Number of steps in the slider.

name: customStep?: Snippet<[any]>
description: Custom step renderer for the slider.

name: customButton?: Snippet
description: Custom button renderer for the slider.

name: onChange?: (value: number) => void
description: Callback function triggered when the slider value changes.
